title: Crown Hill University Emerges Second Position (KWEPA Ranking)
desc: The result of the recent assessment by the Kwara State Environmental Protection Agency, (KWEPA) across the tertiary institutions in State, has indicated that our Crown-Hill University was ranked as the second most Hygiene University
